meanings.definition: A person who makes or holds a reservation.
meanings.sent1: The reservationist booked a table at the restaurant for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The reservationist called ahead to secure a spot for the group.
meanings.sent3: The reservationist always has a plan, even for spontaneous outings.
meanings.sent4: She was a reservationist of time, always ensuring everything was scheduled.
meanings.sent5: The reservationist's organization skills were unmatched, keeping everything in order.

meanings.definition: A person who advocates for the preservation of land or resources.
meanings.sent1: The reservationist fought to protect the forest from deforestation.
meanings.sent2: As a reservationist, she worked tirelessly to save the endangered species.
meanings.sent3: The reservationist joked that she was the 'guardian of the trees'.
meanings.sent4: He was a reservationist of nature, standing firm against any harm to the environment.
meanings.sent5: The reservationist's dedication to conservation inspired others to join the cause.
